entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
